ComicInfo.Summary:
Exiled in a world of forgotten heroes and villains known as Limbo Land, Ms. Moonbeam hopes one day to be released and put back into a main story of her own--all of that gets thrown into a major existential crisis with the arrival of Colonel Weird into her world, leading her on a quest to find her way out of Limbo Land.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Melissa Duffy | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Veronica Fish | 2 | C | Variant Cover | Yuko Shimizu | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-30 02:01:17. [CVDB881344]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Melissa Duffy, Veronica Fish, Yuko Shimizu
ComicInfo.Editor: Chuck Howitt, Daniel Chabon, Konner Knudsen
ComicInfo.Characters: Colonel Weird, Inspector Insector, Lonnie James, Ms. Moonbeam
